title: Weekly Roundup: Friday, March 4
description: The NPR Politics team talks about Thursday night's GOP debate, the next round of primary/caucus states, and answers some listener questions.  This episode: political editor Domenico Montanaro, congressional correspondent Susan Davis, campaign reporter Sam Sanders, and White House correspondent/host Tamara Keith. Find the team on Twitter @DomenicoNPR, @DaviSusan, @samsanders, and @tamarakeithNPR, and at nprpolitics.org.  You can email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
